pkgmetadata.longdescription: libplayer is a multimedia A/V abstraction layer API. Its goal is to interact with Enna Media Center. libplayer provides a generic A/V API that relies on various multimedia player for Linux systems. It currently supports MPlayer, xine VLC and GStreamer only. Its main goal is to provide an unique API that player frontends can use to control any kind of multimedia player underneath. For example, it provides a library to easily control MPlayer famous slave-mode.
